Color rules:

Red: Highest card
Orange: Cards of one number
Yellow: Cards of one color
Green: Even cards
Blue: Cards of all different colors
Indigo: Cards that form a run (I.E. 4 5 6)
Purple: Cards bellow 4

Deck

RED7

Action rules:

1: Choose a card from another player's Palette, and place it face down on top of the Draw Deck. You may not choose a player with fewer Palette cards than you.
3: Draw a card from the Draw Deck.
5: Play another card from your hand to your Palette. You can still discard to the Canvas after doing so.
7: Choose a card from your Palette and either discard it to the Canvas or place it face down on top of the Draw Deck. If you discard it, you must be winning afterward.
